options.content:
Kyma-project pull requests statistics

all data presented include DRAFT pull requests

targets.rawSql:
SELECT concat(year,"-",month) as Time, avg(processing_time) as suma 
FROM (WITH pulls AS
(
  (
   SELECT DISTINCT 
        repository.name as repository,
        number,
        labels_unpacked.name as label,
        created_at,
        closed_at
    FROM `sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_com_kyma_project`, UNNEST(labels) as labels_unpacked
    WHERE pull_request.url != "NULL" AND closed_at IS NOT NULL
  )
)
SELECT created_at as Time2, FORMAT_TIMESTAMP( "%Y", created_at, "UTC") as year, FORMAT_TIMESTAMP( "%m", created_at, "UTC") as month, TIMESTAMP_DIFF(closed_at, created_at, day) as processing_time from pulls 

)
group by Time order by Time desc

SELECT concat(year,"-",month) as Time, repository, count(repository) as testinfra
FROM (WITH pulls AS
(
  (
   SELECT DISTINCT 
        repository.name as repository,
        created_at,
    FROM `sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_com_kyma_project`
    WHERE repository.name IN ("test-infra") AND pull_request.url != "NULL"
  )
)
SELECT FORMAT_TIMESTAMP( "%Y", created_at, "UTC") as year, FORMAT_TIMESTAMP( "%m", created_at, "UTC") as month, created_at, repository from pulls

)
group by Time, repository
order by Time desc

SELECT concat(year,"-",month) as Time, repository, count(repository) as busola
FROM (WITH pulls AS
(
  (
   SELECT DISTINCT 
        repository.name as repository,
        created_at,
    FROM `sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_com_kyma_project`
    WHERE repository.name IN ("busola") AND pull_request.url != "NULL"
  )
)
SELECT FORMAT_TIMESTAMP( "%Y", created_at, "UTC") as year, FORMAT_TIMESTAMP( "%m", created_at, "UTC") as month, created_at, repository from pulls

)
group by Time, repository
order by Time desc

SELECT Repository, count(repository) as Open_PRs_count
FROM (WITH pulls AS
(
  (
   SELECT  
        repository.name as repository,
        created_at, pull_request.url as url
    FROM `sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_com_kyma_project`
    WHERE pull_request.url != "NULL" and closed_at is NULL
  )
)
SELECT created_at, repository, url from pulls

)
group by repository
order by Repository asc

SELECT Repository, created_at as Created, url
FROM (WITH pulls AS
(
  (
   SELECT  
        repository.name as repository,
        created_at, pull_request.url as url
    FROM `sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_com_kyma_project`
    WHERE pull_request.url != "NULL" and closed_at is NULL
  )
)
SELECT created_at, repository, url from pulls

)

order by Repository asc, Created desc
